Package de.pcmr.shop.service

Interface OrderServiceI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OrderServiceImpl
    public interface OrderServiceI
    Interface of the order service. Orders can be processed an listed.
    Author:
    Fynn Lohse

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<OrderEntity> getAllOrders()
      Method returns all orders entities of all customers.

    • Method Detail

      • processOrder

        void processOrder​(@Valid
                  @Valid OrderEntity orderEntity,
                  java.security.Principal principal)
           throws NotEnoughArticlesOnStockException,
                  DuplicateOrderItemsException,
                  NoCustomerFoundException,
                  AddressDoesNotBelongToUserException
        Method processes new order. It validates that there are no duplicates, checks the stock, calculates the prices and finally saves the order.
        Parameters:
        orderEntity - order entity
        principal - principal of spring security context
        Throws:
        NotEnoughArticlesOnStockException - if not enough article are on stock
        DuplicateOrderItemsException - if there are duplicate order items referring to the same article
        NoCustomerFoundException - if no customer could be determined by the principal
        AddressDoesNotBelongToUserException - if the provided address is not owned by the current customer

      • getAllOrders

        java.util.List<OrderEntity> getAllOrders()
        Method returns all orders entities of all customers.
        Returns:
        list of all orders.

      • getAllOrdersOfCustomer

        java.util.List<OrderEntity> getAllOrdersOfCustomer​(java.security.Principal principal)
                                            throws NoCustomerFoundException
        Method return all orders placed by the current customer.
        Parameters:
        principal - principal of spring security context
        Returns:
        list of all orders placed by the current customer
        Throws:
        NoCustomerFoundException - if no customer could be determined by the principal
